page.title: 19WILDLIFE IN LLANBRYNMAIR
page.content: In our area we have lots of wild animals and birds.There are many foxes in the woods.You can see the work of many moles in the fields.You may see many grey squirrels by and in the trees.If you are lucky you may be able to see one or two badgers in the woods.We see a lot of rabbits in the area.There are many frogs and toads in Llanbrynmair.In our area there are lots of crows.You may hear owls hooting in the night.You can see one or two pheasants quite often in the area.There are a number of Buzzards in our area.You can see Herons around the rivers or when they are flying.Around our area there are many magpies.Red kites are seen occasionally in Llanbrynmair.
